text: Electoral districts of Poland (, ()) are defined by Polish election law. Electoral districts can be divided depending on whether they are individual entities or parts of a larger electoral district with regard to elections to 1) parliament (Sejm) and Senate 2) local offices and 3) European Parliament. Each district has a number of mandates calculated on the basis of its population. == List of Sejm constituencies == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! No. !! Name !! # of deputies !! title: Electoral districts of Poland
